can_do_statement: I can talk about upcoming plans.

lessons.title: Introducing Plans
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to introduce upcoming plans using basic phrases.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a ir al cine mañana. (I am going to go to the cinema tomorrow.)
Pienso ir de compras el sábado. (I plan to go shopping on Saturday.)
Quiero visitar a mis abuelos pronto. (I want to visit my grandparents soon.)
El próximo fin de semana voy a la playa. (Next weekend I am going to the beach.)
Este martes voy a estudiar. (This Tuesday I am going to study.)
Mañana voy a trabajar. (Tomorrow I am going to work.)
Luego voy a comer. (Later I am going to eat.)
Después voy a leer. (Afterwards I am going to read.)

lessons.title: Plans with Friends
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to talk about plans they have with friends.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a salir con mis amigos. (I am going out with my friends.)
Vamos a ver una película. (We are going to see a movie.)
¿Quieres ir al parque? (Do you want to go to the park?)
Nosotros vamos a jugar fútbol. (We are going to play soccer.)

cards.back: What are you going to do?
cards.example_sentence: ¿Qué vas a hacer este fin de semana? (What are you going to do this weekend?)
Tal vez vaya a la fiesta. (Maybe I'll go to the party.)
Hay una fiesta el sábado. (There is a party on Saturday.)
Voy a estudiar un rato. (I'm going to study for a while.)
Vamos a comer cerca de mi casa. (We are going to eat near my house.)

lessons.title: Family Plans
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to discuss upcoming plans with their family.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a cenar con mi familia. (I am going to have dinner with my family.)
Voy a visitar a mis padres. (I am going to visit my parents.)
Voy a jugar con mis hermanos. (I am going to play with my siblings.)
Vamos a comer pizza. (We are going to eat pizza.)
Vamos a visitar un museo. (We are going to visit a museum.)
Vamos a ver una película en casa. (We are going to watch a movie at home.)
Vamos a ir a un museo de arte. (We are going to go to an art museum.)
El domingo vamos al parque. (On Sunday we are going to the park.)

lessons.title: School Plans
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to describe upcoming school-related plans.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a estudiar para el examen. (I am going to study for the exam.)
Tengo la clase de español mañana. (I have Spanish class tomorrow.)
Tengo un examen el lunes. (I have an exam on Monday.)
Voy a jugar baloncesto después de la escuela. (I am going to play basketball after school.)
Tengo que hacer un proyecto. (I have to do a project.)
Tengo mucha tarea. (I have a lot of homework.)
Tengo una clase el lunes. (I have a class on Monday.)
Voy a escribir un ensayo. (I am going to write an essay.)
Voy a leer un libro. (I am going to read a book.)

lessons.title: Weekend Plans
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to discuss weekend plans and activities.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a descansar el fin de semana. (I am going to rest on the weekend.)

cards.back: I am going to go shopping
cards.example_sentence: Voy a ir de compras el sábado. (I am going to go shopping on Saturday.)
Voy a ir a la playa. (I am going to go to the beach.)
Voy a ir a un concierto. (I am going to go to a concert.)
Voy a ver un partido de fútbol. (I am going to watch a soccer game.)
El sábado voy al cine. (On Saturday I am going to the cinema.)
Quiero descansar el domingo. (I want to rest on Sunday.)
Voy a salir con amigos. (I am going to go out with friends.)
Voy a cocinar el domingo. (I am going to cook on Sunday.)

lessons.title: Future Events
lessons.objective: Learners will be able to talk about future events like birthdays or holidays.

cards.example_sentence: Voy a celebrar mi cumpleaños. (I am going to celebrate my birthday.)
Voy a viajar en las vacaciones. (I am going to travel during the holidays.)
Voy a pasar Navidad con mi familia. (I am going to spend Christmas with my family.)
Voy a celebrar el año nuevo. (I am going to celebrate New Year's.)
Quiero un regalo para mi cumpleaños. (I want a gift for my birthday.)
Voy a celebrar con mis amigos. (I am going to celebrate with my friends.)
Quiero viajar a España. (I want to travel to Spain.)
En el futuro quiero tener una casa. (In the future I want to have a house.)
Hay un evento importante. (There is an important event.)
